# Pre

##

Pre with tab:

	code block
	on two lines

Text with space:

 now a text block
 on two lines

Pre with blank line:

	before

	after

EOF

---
<h1>Pre</h1>
<section>
<p>Pre with tab:</p>
<pre><code>code block
on two lines
</code></pre>
<p>Text with space:</p>
<p>now a text block
on two lines</p>
<p>Pre with blank line:</p>
<pre><code>before

after
</code></pre>
<p>EOF</p>
</section>
